languages.text: "Так может, Ваша Светлость, того — про наследство уже поговорим? Потому как воспоминания это хорошо, но есть вопросы насущные".
"Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."
languages.original_text: "Так может, Ваша Светлость, того — про наследство уже поговорим? Потому как воспоминания это хорошо, но есть вопросы насущные".

traits.locale_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues here."
"Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues here."
"Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."
"Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."
"Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

languages.text: “既然如此，大人，或许我们应该继续，呃，讨论一下继承权的问题？回忆过去的日子确实很令人开心，但眼下我们还有更迫切的问题要处理。”
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，大人，或许我们应该继续，呃，讨论一下继承权的问题？回忆过去的日子确实很令人开心，但眼下我们还有更迫切的问题要处理。”

languages.text: «Entonces, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿le importaría que pasemos a, esto... el tema de la herencia? No tengo nada en contra de recordar el pasado, pero es un asunto urgente».
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿le importaría que pasemos a, esto... el tema de la herencia? No tengo nada en contra de recordar el pasado, pero es un asunto urgente».

languages.text: 「では、陛下…そろそろ遺産相続の話を進めても？思い出に浸りたい気持ちはわかりますが、急ぎの問題があるので」
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: 「では、陛下…そろそろ遺産相続の話を進めても？思い出に浸りたい気持ちはわかりますが、急ぎの問題があるので」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, könnten wir dann vielleicht, äh, über die Erbschaft sprechen? Das Schwelgen in Erinnerungen ist ja sehr schön, aber die Angelegenheit ist doch recht dringlich."
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, könnten wir dann vielleicht, äh, über die Erbschaft sprechen? Das Schwelgen in Erinnerungen ist ja sehr schön, aber die Angelegenheit ist doch recht dringlich."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, Votre Seigneurie, on pourrait peut-être... discuter de l'héritage ? Parce que c'est bien beau, tout ça, mais on a des affaires plus urgentes à régler. »
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, Votre Seigneurie, on pourrait peut-être... discuter de l'héritage ? Parce que c'est bien beau, tout ça, mais on a des affaires plus urgentes à régler. »

languages.text: "O zaman {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, artık miras konusunu konuşsak mı? Eski günleri yâd etmek güzel ama bununla da ilgilenilmesi gerek."
languages.original_text: "Then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, maybe we should, uh, discuss the inheritance? Reminiscing is nice and all, but we've got pressing issues to deal with here."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, artık miras konusunu konuşsak mı? Eski günleri yâd etmek güzel ama bununla da ilgilenilmesi gerek."
